txt.en:
We found what you sent us in search of, Ugrukh√¥r, but my boys need a big reward if you think we're giving it to you. There were Elves crawling all over that ruin, and we barely escaped with our lives! We had to take the long way, and ran into some trouble with Her minions; they were going our way, and none of the boys wanted to chance it. We're going to try the Elf Gate next.

But we found the opening spell, or part of it, anyway. The Falch Gurth won't remain closed to you any longer. How badly do you want it?

Maybe me and the boys will bring these words to Gothmog. He'd find them interesting, wouldn't he, and I wager he'd be quite generous. You promised a reward! Double it and he'll never see this opening spell. I am sure you will make the right decision, boss.
